channel.title: ClickingButtons, Only 1 button works on interface

item.title: ClickingButtons, Only 1 button works on interface
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

Hey Guys, I created an interface for my server, and now im trying to add functions to it, and now its being all like, NOU!

Ony the first actionbutton works.

This is the code

[code=java] case 115121: //close
c.getPA().removeAllWindows();
break;
case 122019://RED
if(!c.getItems().playerHasItem(c.lastClickd, 1)) {
c.sendMessage(“You shoudln’t try and dupe kid.”);
return;
}
if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(c.lastClickd, 1) ) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(c.lastClickd, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(9101, 1);
}
break;
